Require Import Coq.ZArith.ZArith.
 Require Import Coq.micromega.Psatz.
 Require Import Coq.Setoids.Setoid.
 Require Import Coq.Logic.Classical_Prop.
 Local Open Scope Z.
   Definition convex (f: Z -> Z): Prop :=   forall x: Z, f (x - 1) + f (x + 1) >= 2 * f x.
  Definition mono (f: Z -> Z): Prop :=   forall n m, n <= m -> f n <= f m.
  Fact logic_ex1: forall T: (Z -> Z) -> (Z -> Z),   (forall f, mono f -> mono (T f)) ->   (forall f, convex f -> convex (T f)) ->   (forall f, mono f /\ convex f -> mono (T f) /\ convex (T f)).
